key.name: time-step-intense
key.summary: Animation Time Step For Intense Effects
key.description: The amount of time in milliseconds between each render of the intense animation (Ex. Burn, Beam). The higher the number, the jerkier the movements become. (1 - 400)

key.name: airplane-path-length
key.description: Length of airplane's flying path. (0.5 - 3)

key.name: airplane-fly-to-taskbar
key.description: Whether the window should fly to taskbar when minimized with Airplane effect.

key.name: beam-size
key.description: Beam width. (0.1 - 20)

key.name: beam-spacing
key.description: Spacing between beams. (1 - 20)

key.name: beam-color
key.description: Beam color.

key.name: beam-slowdown
key.description: Beam slowdown. (0.1 - 10)

key.name: beam-life
key.description: Beam life. (0.1 - 1)

key.name: fire-particles
key.description: Number of fire particles. (100 - 10000)

key.name: fire-size
key.description: Fire particle size. (0.1 - 20)

key.name: fire-slowdown
key.description: Fire particle slowdown. (0.1 - 10)

key.name: fire-life
key.description: Fire particle life. (0.1 - 1)

key.name: fire-color
key.description: Fire particle color.

key.name: fire-direction
key.description: Fire direction. (0 = Down, 1 = Up, 2 = Left, 3 = Right, 4 = Random, 5 = Automatic)

key.name: fire-constant-speed
key.description: Make fire effect duration be dependent on window height.

key.name: fire-smoke
key.description: Fire smoke.

key.name: fire-mystical
key.description: Have random colors for the fire effect, also known as Mystical Fire.

key.name: domino-direction
key.description: Falling direction for Domino pieces. (0 = Down, 1 = Up, 2 = Left, 3 = Right, 4 = Random, 5 = Automatic)

key.name: explode-gridx
key.description: The exploding window will be split into pieces along a grid. Specify the number of grid cells along the width of the window. (1 - 200)

key.name: explode-gridy
key.description: The exploding window will be split into pieces along a grid. Specify the number of grid cells along the height of the window. (1 - 200)

key.name: explode-spokes
key.description: The exploding window with the shatter animation will be split into pieces radially from the center. Specify the number of radial spokes the animation will have. (1 - 100)

key.name: explode-tiers
key.description: The exploding window will be split into pieces along concentric circles. Specify the number of concentric circles the shatter tessellation will have. (1 - 100)

key.name: explode-thickness
key.description: Thickness of exploding window pieces (in pixels). (0 - 100)

key.name: explode-tessellation
key.description: Tessellation type for exploding window pieces. (0 = Rectangular, 1 = Hexagonal, 2 = Glass)

key.name: fold-gridx
key.description: The animated window will be split into pieces along a grid. Specify the number of grid cells along the width of the window. (1 - 100)

key.name: fold-gridy
key.description: The animated window will be split into pieces along a grid. Specify the number of grid cells along the height of the window. (1 - 100)

key.name: fold-dir
key.description: Window folding direction. (0 = In, 1 = Out)

key.name: glide3-away-position
key.description: Closeness of window to camera at the end of the animation (1.0: Close to camera, -2.0: Away from camera). (-2 - 1)

key.name: glide3-away-angle
key.description: Angle of window at the end of the animation. (-540 - 540)

key.name: glide3-thickness
key.description: Window thickness in pixels. Setting this to larger than 0 will disable shadow, blur, and reflection during the animation. (0 - 100)

key.name: razr-direction
key.description: Fold opening direction for pieces in Razr effect. (0 = Down, 1 = Up, 2 = Left, 3 = Right, 4 = Random, 5 = Automatic)

key.name: skewer-direction
key.description: Movement direction(s) for window pieces. (0 = Left, 1 = Right, 2 = Left-right, 3 = Up, 4 = Down, 5 = Up-down, 6 = In, 7 = Out, 8 = In-out, 9 = Random)

key.name: skewer-tessellation
key.description: Tessellation type for window pieces. (0 = Rectangular, 1 = Hexagonal)

key.name: skewer-gridx
key.description: The animated window will be split into pieces along a grid. Specify the number of grid cells along the width of the window. (1 - 100)

key.name: skewer-gridy
key.description: The animated window will be split into pieces along a grid. Specify the number of grid cells along the height of the window. (1 - 100)

key.name: skewer-thickness
key.description: Thickness of animated window pieces (in pixels). (0 - 100)

key.name: skewer-rotation
key.description: Rotation angle of animated window pieces (in degrees). (-720 - 720)
